meta.title: Fred Mercy
meta.description: Welcome to my home on the web; it is a blend of a many things. It's a portfolio, a repository of public notes, a way to express myself creatively, a blog, and anything else I want it to be. Feel free to browse and let me know if you need anything, eh? Alright, cool.
